title: Password Generator
shortDesc: Modern password generator with customizable options
longDesc: A secure password generator that allows users to create strong, randomized passwords with customizable length and character types. Built with vanilla JavaScript for optimal performance.

title: ID Card Portfolio
shortDesc: Creative ID card style personal portfolio
longDesc: A unique portfolio concept designed as a digital ID card. Showcases personal information and skills in a compact, visually engaging format using pure CSS animations.

title: TokiList
shortDesc: Anime season tracker using REST API
longDesc: My first API integration project! Fetches and displays currently airing and seasonal anime using the Jikan API. Features search, filtering, and responsive card layout.

title: Bookshelf App
shortDesc: Personal book tracker with Local Storage persistence
longDesc: A simple bookshelf application that allows users to manage their reading list. Add books with title, author, and year; mark them as read or unread; and delete entries. All data is stored locally in the browser using Local Storage, so no backend or login required. Built with vanilla JavaScript to practice DOM manipulation and data persistence.
